text: Jinhen hum ney kitab di hai woh to jo kuch aap per utara jata hai uss say khush hotay hain aur doosray fiqay iss ki baaz baaton say munkir hain. Aap ailaan ker dijiye kay mujhay to sirf yehi hukum diya gaya hai kay mein Allah ki ibadat keroon aur uss kay sath shareek na keroon mein ussi ki taraf bula raha hun aur ussi ki janib mera lotna hai
